text: Rui Carlos Tavares Maurício (born 4 July 1985) is a Portuguese football player who plays for Pinhalnovense. He also holds Angolan citizenship. ==Club career== He made his professional debut in the Segunda Liga for Atlético CP on 8 August 2015 in a game against Freamunde. ==References== ==External links== Category:1985 births Category:People from Almada Category:Portuguese people of Angolan descent Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:C.D. title: Rui Maurício
